All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddNewAlimentWindowController
FXML Controller class for add new aliment window.
Aliment
An instance of this class represents an aliment, also known as food item
AlimentSelectorWindowController
FXML Controller class for aliment selector window.
App
The main class of this program.
Breakfast
A subclass of the Meal class, which takes in the calorie and macro-nutrient goals and calculates 30% of each, and creates the appropriate fitness object for Breakfast.
Chromosome
An instantiation of this class represents a chromosome in the genetic algorithm or in other words a solution within computational space.
Crossover
A genetic algorithm static utility class, in charge of creating offspring based on an even array of parent chromosomes.
Diet
An instantiation of this class represents a complete diet with all four meals (Breakfast, Snack, Lunch, and Dinner).
DietCreationWindowController
FXML Controller class for diet creation window.
DietDisplayWindowController
FXML Controller class for diet display window.
Dinner
A subclass of the Meal class, which takes in the calorie and macro-nutrient goals and calculates 15% of each, and creates the appropriate fitness object for Dinner.
FileManager
A static class which contains operations related to File Management.
FitnessCalculator
A genetic algorithm utility class which includes functions for calculating the fitness of a chromosome.
GoalsCalculatorWindowController
FXML Controller class goals calculator window.
Lunch
A subclass of the Meal class, which takes in the calorie and macro-nutrient goals and calculates 40% of each, and creates the appropriate fitness object for Lunch.
Main
The Main class of the program
Meal
The superclass for Breakfast, Snack, Lunch, and Dinner classes.
Meal.TENDENCY
A static enumerator for specifying meal type.
MealOption
An instance of this class represents a single option in a meal.
MealOptionEditorWindowController
FXML Controller class for meal option editor window.
Mutator
A genetic algorithm static utility class which contains methods for mutating an array of chromosomes.
ParentSelector
A subclass of the TournamentSelector class, implementing the methods for parent selection operations.
PopulationInitializer
A genetic algorithm utility class which handles population related operations.
Snack
A subclass of the Meal class, which takes in the calorie and macro-nutrient goals and calculates 15% of each, and creates the appropriate fitness object for Snack meal.
StartingWindowController
FXML Controller class for Starting window.
SurvivorSelector
A subclass of the TournamentSelector class, implementing the methods for survivor selection operations.
TournamentSelector
A genetic algorithm utility class which acts as the superclass for the SurvivorSelector and TournamentSelector subclasses.
Validation
Static class containing methods for validation of inputs and error handling.
ViewAlimentInfoWindowController
FXML Controller class for viewing aliment information window.
